prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Brass, Pipe, Piano, Guitar, Organ, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Brass, Pipe, Piano, Guitar, and Organ, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Brass, Pipe, Piano, Guitar, and Organ, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Brass, Pipe, Piano, Guitar, and Organ, Bass excluded.
